channel.title: machine learning on
channel.description: Recent content in machine learning on

item.title: Loan Classifier
item.description: Project Details Imported, processed and cleaned loan data for analysis Performed exploratory data analysis with visual and descriptive statistics to better understand dataset Classified loan data using machine learning algorithms such as K Nearest Neighbor(KNN), Decision Tree, Support Vector Machine and Logistic regression Evaluated the accuracy of machine learning algorithms using f1_score and jaccard similarity coefficient score
